Current Question Text: Date/time when payment refused- autogenerated or sent by site
Notes: This will be a repeated measures variable associated with Round and sent any time HDPaym_PaymRefused_v1r0  is updated. When calling the incentiveCompleted API and declaring an incentive completed or refused by a participant, the sites can send their own timestamp in the call but if they don't provide one, NCI will generate it ourselves
Dictionary: Study Manager Data Dictionary, Biospecimen Research
IMS Review Notes: Updated Secondary Source to Collection Details and Variable name HDPaym_TmRefused_v1r0 with HDPaym_TmRefusedBL_v1r0
